title: Development Process of a Blended Learning-Based Community of Practice (CoP) in the Science Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, aimed at establishing CoPs (Communities of Practice) to strengthen science-related practical competencies within enterprises

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of science domain Communities of Practice (CoPs) through collaborative problem-solving activities in a blended learning environment.
Learners can design and operate a peer feedback system by integrating mobile platforms and face-to-face sessions.
Learners can develop strategies for building social networks to sustain a learning community over eight weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
